<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hemlock](/Equipment.aspx?ID=117)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Ingested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 552 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 2,250 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Concentrated hemlock is a particularly deadly toxin that halts muscle action—including that of the victim's heart.

**Saving Throw** DC 40 Fortitude; **Onset** 30 minutes; **Maximum Duration** 60 minutes; **Stage 1** 17d6 poison damage and [enfeebled 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) (10 minutes); **Stage 2** 21d6 poison damage and enfeebled 3 (10 minutes); **Stage 3** 26d6 poison damage and enfeebled 4 (10 minutes) 

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Hemlock
